content: I'm looking for some recipe ideas for using up leftover veggies. I've got some broccoli, sweet potatoes, and Brussels sprouts that I roasted last Sunday. By the way, speaking of food, I've been getting a lot of takeout lately - like that veggie burger from Burger King on Monday, which was around $10, and the spaghetti Bolognese from Bella Vita on Wednesday, which was around $15. Do you have any suggestions for using up these veggies?
